title: auth login command functionality
description: Test the n8n auth login command to ensure it correctly configures CLI credentials using flags, environment variables, and interactive prompts. Verify successful connection validation with the n8n instance and proper error handling for invalid inputs.

title: auth status command output
description: Verify the n8n auth status command accurately reports the current authentication status, including connection state and API key validity. Test output in both human-readable and JSON formats and validate exit codes for configured and unconfigured states.

title: auth logout command clears credentials
description: Ensure the n8n auth logout command successfully clears stored CLI credentials and outputs confirmation in both standard and JSON formats.

title: health command connectivity check
description: Test the n8n health command to verify it correctly checks n8n instance connectivity and API key validity. Confirm appropriate exit codes and output formats for healthy and unhealthy states.

title: nodes search command results
description: Validate the n8n nodes search command to ensure it accurately searches the local SQLite node database using different search modes (OR, AND, FUZZY), respects result limits, and supports saving results to JSON files.

title: nodes get command detail retrieval
description: Test the n8n nodes get command to retrieve detailed information about specific node types from the local database. Verify output modes (info, docs, versions), detail levels (minimal, standard, full), and saving to JSON files.

title: workflows create command with dry run
description: Verify the n8n workflows create command correctly processes workflow JSON files to create new workflows on the n8n instance. Test the dry-run mode to preview creation without actual changes and validate JSON output and error handling.

title: workflows update command with activation options
description: Test the n8n workflows update command to update existing workflows on the n8n instance, including activating or deactivating workflows. Verify backup creation, confirmation prompt skipping, and JSON output.

title: workflows autofix command application
description: Validate the n8n workflows autofix command to automatically fix known workflow issues with options for dry-run, confidence levels, saving fixed workflows locally, applying fixes to the server, and skipping backups.

title: workflows trigger command webhook execution
description: Test the n8n workflows trigger command to trigger workflows via webhook URLs using different HTTP methods and request body data. Verify handling of 2xx and non-2xx responses and JSON output formatting.
